title: Rage Nimbus will use its ability on creatures with Defender

comments.body: Rage Nimbus uses MagicMustAttackTargetPicker and that returns a target score of -100 for permanents with the Defender ability. This fact and a few test games suggest that choosing a target with Defender is very rare so I'm not sure this is fixable without resorting to explicitly preventing such targets to be chosen at all.
